My favorite bird
a Gannet
ever majestic
wild
now no more 

drowned
in seawater
tangled up
in man-made plastic

there you lay
washed up
for my feet
looking
in my sad eyes.

at the cliffs
I burried you
stone by stone
rest in peace. 

AFdK
7-12-2019

Please RT
#TurnTheTideOnPlastic https://t.co/hoWpYIDR8L
